      • robotBeginContact

        private void robotBeginContact(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body robot,
                               com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body object,
                               com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Fixture fix)

        Parameters:
        robot - Robot body
        object - Other object body that is going to be determined
        fix - Fixture associated to the object

        Parameters:

        object - object that character was in contact with

        Parameters:
        character - character body that is colliding
        platform - platform body that character is colliding with
